ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Geforce 4 MX vs Geforce 4 Ti
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, Verant IS creating a new graphics engine. But not for our EverQuest. They are already creating Everquest 2. It is due for release sometime next year.
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, Verant IS creating a new graphics engine. But not for our
EverQuest. They are already creating Everquest 2. It is due for release
sometime next year. Info at http://everquest2.station.sony.com
luv,
-Su

> i played "Anarchy Online" and was in the beta of "Neocron": the gfx
> is very good - sometimes i prefer AO's to EQ's ! - and they don't
> eat up all of your ressources. IMHO the verant people can do and they
> should really start to work on building up a better gfx engine.
> i mean it is just crazy to demand from the users to use P4s and
> geforce 4 cards, when others can do superb gfx with P2/P3 based
> systems and a TNT2 or geforce 2.
>
>
> have fun
> Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
> level 52 female gnome magician
> Tarew Marr
>
>
>
